en.title: FE Donates RM 20,000 to Women's Aid Organisation 28th February 2009!!
en.content: FE continues to help the underprivileged and the needy as part of it's social entrepreneurship drive. At FE's function at PGRM on the 28th February 2009, FE presented a mockup cheque of RM 20,000 as donation to the Women's Aid Organisation (WAO) represented by Annie Varghese. WAO provides home and shelter where victims of domestic violence and their children can seek refuge. WAO was started in 1979 by the late Tun Tan Siew Sin. FE is proud to be able to contribute towards the shelter and help the victims of domestic violence.
